text: Torrie Andrew Robertson (born August 2, 1961 in Victoria, British Columbia) is a Canadian retired ice hockey player who played for the Washington Capitals, Hartford Whalers and Detroit Red Wings of the National Hockey League. Drafted in 1980 by the Capitals, Robertson was traded to the Whalers in 1983. Primarily known as an enforcer, he is the Whalers' all-time penalty minutes leader with 1,368.
